item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: NoSQL, but it's SQLite (36 points | 23 comments)

3. The essays of Michel de Montaigne online (86 points | 21 comments)
4. Slow deployment causes meetings (2015) (107 points | 35 comments)

6. Turning Ethereum into a Community Project (17 points | discuss)
7. City Roads: A tool to draw all roads in a city at once (294 points | 43 comments)
8. A data table thousands of years old (2020) (196 points | 80 comments)
9. The legacy of NeXT lives on in OS X (2012) (34 points | 30 comments)
10. Query Apple's FindMy network with Python (414 points | 161 comments)
11. Meet Bex, Kawasaki's Rideable Robot Goat (13 points | 8 comments)

13. How we made our AI code review bot stop leaving nitpicky comments (154 points | 100 comments)
14. Enum of Arrays (101 points | 27 comments)
15. Rosetta 2 creator leaves Apple to work on Lean full-time (220 points | 73 comments)
16. Dividing unsigned 8-bit numbers (133 points | 58 comments)
17. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (135 points | 76 comments)
18. One Surprising Psychosis Treatment That Works: Learning to Live with the Voices (9 points | 2 comments)
19. Keeping a Changelog at Work (2020) (97 points | 36 comments)
20. JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (96 points | 21 comments)
21. The distribution of eigenvalues of GUE and its minors at fixed index (3 points | discuss)
22. Show HN: Eonfall – A new third-person co-op action game built for the web (177 points | 116 comments)
23. Show HN: Demo of my web game about social persuasion (97 points | 41 comments)
24. Fault Report – and alternative to Result in F# (35 points | 14 comments)
25. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (106 points | 47 comments)
26. Show HN: GitHub-assistant – Natural language questions from your GitHub data (27 points | 8 comments)
27. Train a Mnist VAE with C and CUDA (33 points | 2 comments)
28. Wuppertal's suspended monorail proved its doubters wrong [video] (78 points | 33 comments)
29. Introducing S2 (292 points | 149 comments)
30. Show HN: Rivet Actors – Durable Objects build with Rust, FoundationDB, Isolates (111 points | 24 comments)
